009package imagingbook.common.color.colorspace;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.max;
012import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.min;
013
014/**
015 * Methods for converting between RGB and HLS color spaces.
016 * @author W. Burger
017 * @version 2022/09/01
018*/
019public class HsvConverter {
020        
021        public HsvConverter() { 
022        }
023
024        public float[] fromRGB (int[] RGB) {
025                final int R = RGB[0], G = RGB[1], B = RGB[2]; // R,G,B in [0,255]               
026                final int cHi = max(R, G, B);                                   // max. component value
027                final int cLo = min(R, G, B);                                   // min. component value
028                final int cRng = cHi - cLo;                                 // component range
029                //final float cMax = 255.0f;
030                
031                // compute value V
032                float V = cHi / 255.0f;
033                float H = 0, S = 0;
034                
035                // compute saturation S
036                if (cHi > 0)
037                        S = (float) cRng / cHi;
038
039                // compute hue H
040                if (cRng > 0) { // hue is defined only for color pixels
041                        float rr = (float)(cHi - R) / cRng;
042                        float gg = (float)(cHi - G) / cRng;
043                        float bb = (float)(cHi - B) / cRng;
044                        float hh;
045                        if (R == cHi)                   // R is largest component value
046                                hh = bb - gg;
047                        else if (G == cHi)              // G is largest component value
048                                hh = rr - bb + 2;
049                        else                            // B is largest component value
050                                hh = gg - rr + 4;
051                        if (hh < 0)
052                                hh = hh + 6;
053                        H = hh / 6;
054                }
055                return new float[] {H, S, V};
056        }
057        
058        public int[] toRGB (float[] HSV) {
059                final float H = HSV[0], S = HSV[1], V = HSV[2];  // H,S,V in [0,1]
060                final float hh = (6 * H) % 6;                 
061                final int   c1 = (int) hh;                     
062                final float c2 = hh - c1;
063                final float x = (1 - S) * V;
064                final float y = (1 - (S * c2)) * V;
065                final float z = (1 - (S * (1 - c2))) * V;
066                float r = 0, g = 0, b = 0;
067                switch (c1) {
068                        case 0: r = V; g = z; b = x; break;
069                        case 1: r = y; g = V; b = x; break;
070                        case 2: r = x; g = V; b = z; break;
071                        case 3: r = x; g = y; b = V; break;
072                        case 4: r = z; g = x; b = V; break;
073                        case 5: r = V; g = x; b = y; break;
074                        default: // this should not happen
075                }
076                int R = min(Math.round(r * 255), 255);
077                int G = min(Math.round(g * 255), 255);
078                int B = min(Math.round(b * 255), 255);
079                return new int[] {R, G, B};
080        }
081
082}
